title: The Great Alchemical Tithe
flavor_text: The Grand Archivist has observed a destabilizing surge in the realm's currency, threatening to tear the fabric of our trade ley-lines. To prevent total economic collapse, the Citadel has opened the Eternal Vats, calling upon all citizens to transmute their excess gold into 'Aetheric Essence' to power the realm's protective wards.
objective: Contribute 1,000,000 Gold to the Imperial Alchemical Vats in the capital city to help reach the global server goal of 500 Billion Gold.
reward: The 'Exchequer’s Seal' legendary badge, a unique 'Gilded Void' mount, and the permanent server-wide title: 'Stabilizer of the Realm'.
